text: Andrea Schreiner (born 27 April 1959) is a Canadian rower. She competed in the women's single sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1986 Commonwealth Games
title: Andrea Schreiner
